Key Match Events: Kieffer Moore struck inside the opening minute to give Wales an early lead.
Harry Wilson doubled Wales' advantage with a stunning strike two minutes later.
Driton Camaj pulled one back for Montenegro deep into the second half.
Stevan Jovetic's effort from the halfway line hit the crossbar early in the first half.
Vladimir Jovovic curled an effort against the woodwork after the interval.
Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy promised to make changes for the trip to Niksic and delivered with five alterations from the previous game.
Post-Match Reflections: Wales secured their first win under Craig Bellamy.
Bellamy's side showed character despite challenging weather conditions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Driving rain at the Stadion Gradski stifled the performance.
Connor Roberts was forced to pull out just before the break due to injury.
